descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: LeBron James throws a long distance pass to DeAndre Jordan who seals away his defender and stuffs down a two-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron finds DJ for the transition dunk) 2021/11/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron finds DJ for the transition dunk

videos.description: Frank Jackson gets the ball on the fast break and skies to the basket to throw down a two-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Frank Jackson rocks the rim with a dunk on the break) 2021/11/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Frank Jackson rocks the rim with a dunk on the break

videos.description: LeBron James shows off his court vision as he sees Wayne Ellington out of the corner of his eye throws a nice pass to him under the basket for an easy score.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron throws a slick dime to Ellington for a bucket) 2021/11/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron throws a slick dime to Ellington for a bucket

videos.description: Jerami Grant makes a sweet dish

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jerami Grant makes a sweet dish) 2021/11/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jerami Grant makes a sweet dish

videos.description: Jerami Grant drives to the basket and flies right by Carmelo Anthony to drop the hammer on a powerful slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jerami Grant glides by Melo for a slam) 2021/11/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jerami Grant glides by Melo for a slam

videos.description: Isaiah Stewart is serenaded with an onslaught of boos from the Staples Center crowd as he heads to the line for two free throws.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lakers fans boo Isaiah Stewart at the line) 2021/11/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lakers fans boo Isaiah Stewart at the line

videos.description: LeBron James catches the wild pass from Russell Westbrook, then squares up to drain a 3-pointer from the corner and shoots a look over to the Pistons bench.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron nails a 3 in front of Pistons bench) 2021/11/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron nails a 3 in front of Pistons bench
